summary: This document consists of email correspondence between Lisa D. Hurd and Amanda Kirby regarding financial matters related to Southern Financial and Southern Trust. The emails discuss pending transactions and the status of mutual funds and cash notes.

persons.name: Lisa D Hurd
persons.context: Lisa D. Hurd is involved in managing accounts and transactions for Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. and is communicating about mutual funds and financial transactions.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is following up on financial items related to Southern Trust and Southern Financial, seeking information on pending transactions.

keyFacts: Lisa D. Hurd is coordinating the matching of mutual funds for an account.
Amanda Kirby is following up on pending financial transactions for Southern Trust and Southern Financial.
There are pending transactions involving two HSBC notes and cash for Southern Financial.
The correspondence is classified for internal use only and is marked as confidential.
